text: Kjell Olav Opseth (2 January 1936 – 3 December 2017) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Labour Party. He was Minister of Transport and Communications from 1990 to 1996. He was also Minister of Local Government Affairs from 1996 to 1997. He was born in Førde, Sunnfjord, Vestland. Opseth died on 3 December 2017 in Førde, at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Kjell Opseth at Storting.no Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Government ministers Category:Norwegian politicians Category:Vestland
title: Kjell Opseth
